#include<iostream>
int main(){
	while(1){
	long int a, b, temp, t=0, c=0;
	std::cin>>a>>b;
	if(a==0 && b==0){return 0;} 
	if(b>a){
		temp=a;
		a=b;
		b=temp;
	}
	while(b){
		if(a%10+b%10+t>=10){
			c++;
			t=1;
		}
		else{
			t=0;
		}
		a/=10;
		b/=10;
	}
	if(c==0){
		std::cout<<"No carry operation.";
	} 
	else if(c==1){
		std::cout<<"1 carry operation.";
	}
	else{
		std::cout<<c<<" carry operations.";
	}
	std::cout<<std::endl;
  }
}
